release.change: Dependency to DNN 7.0.6 (prior versions have issues with the WebAPI implementation)
Completely new edit screen which allows you to drag images around and edit titles in real time
jQuery upload component should provide a smooth UI for uploading files
New templates: GalleryView, NivoSlider and one using Masonry and Magnific
Updated jQuery upload plugin and made it compatible with latest versions of jQuery
Changed image upload bookkeeping logic to solve concurrency issues
Fix to services js pattern that changed in v 7.2.0 of DNN
Removed all hard coded spacing in the module. Now all through css.
